description: Don't you hate it when you find a structure that has already been picked dry?
/b/Lootr/b/ changes how structure loot is handled. /6/Each player can loot/6/ a chest with seperate loot for each of them. Explore in a group for multiples more treasure.
/c/Breaking a chest will prevent other players from looting it./c/ We ask that you /c/do not break loot chests/c/ as to allow other explorers the chance at some good loot.
Otherwise, the process is the same. Enjoy your riches!
